authors: Baleine, from the original sheet by Mago
instructions:
Character Sheet for Warhammer 40k Deathwatch pen & paper RPG originally published by Fantasy Flight Games (2010) now published by Cubicle 7.

* Sheet functions are described with INFO TOOLTIPS hover over fields and buttons to see them.

* For full documentation and latests updates  visit [Deathwatch Improved Wiki](https://wiki.roll20.net/Deathwatch_improved) 

* If you have any feedback, send a private message to [Author Baleine](https://app.roll20.net/users/4735202/baleine) or [Author Mago](https://app.roll20.net/users/986445/mago) 

* Revision 3 - April 2025
